name: 浣謝祭
summary: Hero owes his mysterious grandfather who supported him for 20 years. To return the favor old man asks him to train a girl. But hero could not even imagine that the girl would be his best friend Yurika.
info:
• 平台: WIN
  • 游戏类型: ADV
  • 发行日期: 1998-08-28
  • ブランド: まんぼ小屋
  • 原画: 魚肉ん
